1.content:
Damon was very excited to be starting his journey as a pokemon trainer. He was going to wake up first thing in the morning and head out to get his pokemon from Professor Rowan.

He was at the dinner table enjoying having dinner with his family. "I am so excited to be going on a journey tomorrow. I'm going to meet lot's of pokemon and become friends with them" said Damon.

"Now you be careful Damon and make sure you have your pokemon with you at all times" said his mother who pet's him on the head.

"I'll be careful mother. I'll have my pokemon with me to protect me" said Damon. "Your so lucky Damon. I wish I was 10 years older now" said Zach.

"You will Zach in two more years. Then when you start off your journey we can have a battle" said Damon. "You'll become a champion by then" said Zach.

"Well that is my dream. To become the new champion of Sinnoh and become friends with all the pokemon. I can't wait to start tomorrow".

After dinner was over. Damon got himself ready for bed. He put on his pajames and heads into bed. He couldn't sleep but he manage to fall asleep.

The next day. Damon starts to wake up and begins to feel a nice wind passing by him. He starts to open his eyes and see's sunlight. When he woke up. He was no longer in his bedroom. He was in a forest like area.

"Where am I? How did I get outside?" he also felt weird and finds a lake. Damon goes over to the lake and see's his reflection. To his surprise. There was a pokemon staring back at him. Damon had realize something else.

"I've been turn into a pokemon" said Damon. What pokemon did he change into?
1.title: Dreaming for tomorrow

11.content:
Looking at the lake. Damon didn't know what pokemon he had change into. It had been a while since he had study pokemon.

All he did see were brown feathers that had grown all over his body. His neck was much longer then it was before. His arms and hands were gone completely.

His legs had been change into bird legs and his feet had been change into claws as well. He also see's that his mouth and nose were now a beak and his eyes were now black.

Damon then remembers the pokemon he had change into. "Oh yeah I remember. I'm a Doduo. I've been change into a Doduo.

Damon couldn't believe he had been change into a Doduo. He also couldn't believe he had been change into a pokemon in the first place.

"I was going to start my journey as a pokemon trainer. But instead I got change into a pokemon instead and I don't know why".

He then realize something. "Wait if I'm a Doduo. Then where's my second head?" He then looks to his left and see's his second who was still asleep.

Damon then pecks him to wake up. "Huh? What's going on?" said the second head. Who was the second head to Damon's new body
11.title: A Doduo

choices: Damon and Zach try out their new boxy
One of their friends finds them.
111.content:
Damon's second head starts to wake up. "Huh? Where am I? Why am I outside?" Damon figures his second head.was like him. He use to be human too.

"'Hey are you okay?" His second head look at him. "Whoa a Doduo and it can talk. Wait where's your other head?"

"Well um you are. We're a Doduo" His second head looks over his new body and was surprise by. "Ahh I've been change into a pokemon"

Damon tries to call him down. "Calm down. Freaking out won't help us" he starts to calm down a bit.

"First we need to know each other. My name is Damon. What's your?" His second head look stun. "Damon? Is it really you?"

Damon then recognize the voice. "Zach?" Somehow the two brothers got change, into a pokemon, and are now sharing the same body.
111.title: His brother Zach

choices: You and Magnus begin learning to work together
A fellow mage, and bully, taunts the both of you. He was the one responsible.
115.content:
"Huh? What's going on?" Damon's second head had asked in groggy voice. It was looking around confused, probably like you had just done when you woke up.

"Um... Hi!" Damon said, unsure about what to say or ask.

His second head whipped his head around towards you. "Oh, hello there little guy!" He said cheerfully. "Where did you come from? You're not a native bird of Sinnoh."

"Huh?" Now Damon was confused. This guys was obviously not a Pokemon; maybe a fellow transformed person? But, Damon did not appreciate this head speaking to him like a little pet. "Stop talking to me like that! I'm human... or... I was."

"What? You're human you say!" The second head looked at you carefully, then his gaze shifted towards the area around them. "Where am I? I don't see the school anywhere!"

"What!? What school? Who are you?" Damon started to fire off questions at the strange person attached to him.

"Uh..." Your other head turned around to look at you again. "You know, the Sinnoh region's Pokemon school of magic!" Your other head said it matter-of-factly, like you should know about it.

"A magical school?" You tilt your head questioningly. Was magic real? That might explain how you woke up as a Pokemon. "Did you do this to me?"

"No, don't be silly." Your other head shook his head. "As you can clearly see, I am not... whatever Pokemon you are. I am a proud Staraptor!" He tiled his head up, trying to take a confident pose.

Was this guy crazy or stupid? You didn't know which was worse. "Um... you are not a Staraptor. We are a Doduo!"

"A what?" Your other head looked puzzled. He then looked down at his, or rather your single body. "That is ridic-- AWH! What happened! Why is your ugly head attached to my body?!"

"What!" you glared at your other head. "We look exactly the same?!" You motioned to the reflection in the lake beside you.

"AWH What Pokemon am I?" He yelled while gawking at his, your, reflection.

"Stop yelling!" You demand. "We're a Doduo, a Kanto region Pokemon."

"This can't be happening!" He looked very distraught. "I came out here and performed the spell perfectly! This shouldn't be happening! I should be a Staraptor... not stuck to you!" Your other head tried pulling away from you, but only the left leg responded. You both were thrown off balance and plunged into the lake. After thrashing about in the water, you both managed to get your footing on the muddy ground.

You spit water from your mouth and glared at your other head. This was turning into the worst day of your life; this was not supposed to be how your day started. You were pissed! Without thinking you began to angrily peck at your other head, and then he began to do the same. It was a flurry of heads, shooting back and forth, up and down, left and right. Your fighting did not cease until, you could not move your head at all. "What happened!" you chocked out.

You both got lost in the fighting that you found yourself on the ground, on your back. Your necks were now tied in an uncomfortable knot. "This is your fault!" Your other head childishly said, trying to glare at you.

"No, your fault!" you angrily replied. You both preceded to try to start the pecking war again, but the knot of your necks only tighten further. "Ugh, truce!" You call out, and your other head agrees. The two of you spend the next hour begrudgingly untangling your necks, but you at least began to understand each other better. Your other head was an apprentice mage named Magnus.
115.title: The PokeMage Apprentice

1151.content:
Damon and Magnus then both got up. "Look it's obvious that the two of us will have to work together if were going to get anywhere" said Damon.

"Agree let's try moving first" Magnus tries to move. But he quickly finds out that he could only move the left leg. "I can only move the left leg" said Magnus.

"Let me try then" Damon tries to move. But quickly realize he can only move the right leg. "I can only move the right leg" said Damon.

"So both of us can only move one leg. We'll have to be in complete sync if were going to get anywhere" Damon and Magnus then starts to move.

They fell, a few times, but they finally learn a pattern together and master walking. The two of them felt their share stomach growl.

"Looks like were hungry. Let's get something to eat" Damon and Magnus then comes upon an orren berry bush and decided to take turns eating.

Magnus takes a bite first and Damon could feel the berry go down their share body. It tasted pretty good as the two friends begins to eat some more.

Unkown to them that someone had found the Doduo friends. Who was it?
1151.title: You and Magnus begin learning to work together

12.content:
When he got, to the lake, Damon sees the Pokemon he had change into. His whole body was cover in brown fur as his hands and feet were now paws.

A fluffy mane was around his neck. His face had been change into his new cute muzzle.

His eyes were now black and his ears were on top, of his head, and were now pointy.

He look back and saw a tail that came out from his behind. Thinking it over. Damon remembers what Pokemon he turn into.

"Im an Eevee. I've been turn into Eevee." Damon had read, about Eevee, before he left on his journey.

Eevee was known to be a Pokemon that had 8 evolutions. But instead of worrying about it. Damon did admit he look cute as an Eevee as he admires his cutness.

"Im very cute. What should I evolve into? I can evolve into 8 types." Eevee was one of his favorite Pokemon. He also learn his sense of smell and hearing has approve as well.

"Maybe being a Pokemon isn't so bad. But I do wonder why I turn into an Eevee in the first place."

Suddenly Damon heard something thanks to his new hearing. He decided to check it out and sees.
12.title: A Eevee

122.content:
He sees one of his friends. It was Jodi and she was crying. One of her Pokemon had been stolen from Team Galactic.

Feeling bad for her. Damon goes up to her. She hasn't notice him as he rubs, his head, on her leg. Jodi starts to notice and looks down.

She sees a cute friendly Eevee trying to cheer her up. Damon looks at Jodi as he smiles. "Eevee." Jodi loves cute Pokemon as she picks Damon.

"Aww your so cute." She hugs Damon and pets his head. Damon licks her face. Jodi giggle.

"Did you try to cheer me up?" Damon nods his head. "Thank you. I love Eevees." Jodi looks, in her bag, and pulls out a pokeball.

"Would you like to be my pokemon?" Damon nods. If he can't be trainer. He could be Jodis Pokemon. Heck maybe he'll find out how he turn into an Eevee in the first place.

"Thank you." Jodi place the pokeball in Damon. Damon stay away from the ball. "What's wrong? You don't want to be in the pokeball?" Said Jodi.

"Vee." Said Damon. "Tell you what. I'll let you out once I capture you." Said Jodi. Damon then got, to the pokeball, as he hit the pokeball.

The pokeball open and Damon was suck into the pokeball as it then click. He then became Jodis pokeball as she let's him out.
122.title: One of his friends.

14.content:
Looking closely in the water's reflection. Damon had seen the pokemon he had been change into. He recognize the pokemon. But he couldn't remember it's name.

He had short blue fur and his hands and feet had been change. A black mask had form around his eyes and his eyes were now red.

Round bumps had form on his front paws. His ears had gone to the top of his head and become floppy. A yellow collar appear around his neck.

Damon looks behind and see's a tail has form from his behind. He begins to touch it and it felt very real. The tail was his own.

Damon then remembers the pokemon he had turn into. "I've been turn into a Riolu" Riolu was one of the native pokemon of Sinnoh. He had always wanted to catch a Riolu and evolve it into a Lucario when he starts his journey. But now he was a Riolu.

He then got an idea. "I wonder if I can do that one attack that only Lucario's can learn" He then tries to use Aura Spheare as he place his paw out. But nothing happen. He look at his paw.

"I guess not. I have to be a Lucario to use Aura Speahere. But how did I change into a Riolu in the first place?" As he continues to think about it.

Someone had found Damon the Riolu. But who?
14.title: A Riolu

choices: Damon is captured and is nicknamed Damon
Damon manages to break out of the pokeball
143.content:
"Oh my goodness!" a girl cried out in excitement. "A Riolu!" Damon turned to find where the familiar voice was coming from. It was a pretty brown haired girl with dazzling green eyes. Her long hair was tied back into a ponytail.

Damon instantly recognized her as his long time friend, "Jodi!" Damon exclaimed.

"Okay, I'm going to catch this cute little guy." She said to herself. "Too bad Damon isn't here; he'd of probably wanted to catch it too." The girl looked sad for a moment, before she refocused onto Damon, the Riolu.

"Wait! Jodi, its me Damon! I am here!" you yelled. You dashed forward waving your hands above your head.

"AWWW!" Jodi screeched; she could not understand a word that Damon was saying. "Its attacking! Go Quinn!" She threw her pokeball, and a blue penguin popped out.

"What! No Jodi, its me. I'm not attacking." Damon yelled desperately.

Piplup turned his head curiously at Damon. "How does this Pokemon know my trainer's name? Oh well." Piplup dashed forward and used Peck, like Jodi had just asked it to do. Piplup's beak glowed white and grew longer; it hit Damon in the chest and knocked him back.

"Ugh! That really hurt!" Damon said, rubbing his chest with a paw. "Okay, I have to attack back." He then gulped loudly, realizing that he knew none of his own moves.

"He's still up! Piplup, use peck again!" Jodi yelled, and her Pokemon did as she asked. He ran forward with his long, glowing beak.

"Uh, uh... what do I do?" Damon, in a panic, closed his eyes and crossed his arms in front of his body for protection. His body began to glow orange. When Piplup hit him, Damon could feel the damage he took turn into energy within himself. He needed to discharge it. Focusing the energy into the palm of his left paw, he punched forward, and blasted Piplup in the stomach. Piplup flew back a distance and rolled.

"Ehhh..." Piplup was struggling to stand back up.

"No, Quinn! Use Aqua Ring!" Jodi yelled, and her Piplup did just that. Interlacing rings of water formed from the moisture in the air and surrounded the blue penguin. He glowed slightly, drawing revitalizing energy from the water.

"Uh-oh. I have to do something!" Damon exclaimed. "So I know Counter, but what else?"

"Alright Quinn, use Bubble!" Piplup ran towards Damon, and jumped high into the air. He opened his mouth and spray of shiny bubbles flew towards Damon.

Damon was unable to dodge them. "AWWWW!" He screamed, landing hard onto his back. His limbs felt heavy, and standing back up seemed to difficult.

"Now, go pokeball!" Jodi yelled. She threw it hard and accurately; the pokeball flew towards Damon.
143.title: One of his friends

choices: One of their friends finds them.
1431.content:
The pokeball begins to roll three times before it click. Damon had been captured by Jodi as she picks up his pokeball.

"Alright I caught a Riolu" inside the pokeball. Damon found himself in a dark void. "So this is what it's like to be in a pokeball. How do I get out?"

Damon then felt himself pull out of the pokeball. Jodi looks at Damon and smile. She begins to let him. Damon like it.

"Your a cute little Riolu. I'm Jodi and this is my partner Piplup. I name it Quin. Quin goes up to Damon and shake his paw.

"Nice to meet you" said Quin. "So what should I call you then?" Damon then got an idea and wrote his name on the dirt.

"Damon? Alright I'll call you Damon then. Funny my friends name is Damon as well" Damon hope Jodi thinks he was the real Damon change into a Riolu. Jodi checks out his moves with her pokedex.

"It says here you know counter quick attack and Force palm. We should try some of your attacks out"

Damon nods. He wanted to get in his first battle out and get use to his new form out. "I might as well have some fun. I always wanted to be a pokemon" said Damon
1431.title: Damon is captured and is nicknamed Damon

choices: Want to merge our aura's together?
Want to come home with me?
1433.content:
But before Jodi could capture Damon. Another Riolu intervenes and attacks Piplup with Force Palm. Piplup was hit by the attack.

"No Quinn" Jodi scream. Riolu goes over to the pokeball and press's the button on it. Damon was free from his pokeball prison.

Riolu then grabs his paw. "Don't worry. I'm here to help you" Before Damon could say anything. Riolu begins to take him away from Jodi.

Jodi follow's them with her Piplup. She begins to search but couldn't find them. Eventually she gives up. "Awww. I wanted to catch that Riolu too"

Jodi and Piplup then left. Damon looks at the Riolu that save him. "Thanks for saving me back there. I don't know what I would do if I was capture" said Damon.

"Anything to help out a Riolu brother out" Damon looks at Riolu with a confuse look. "A Riolu brother?" Damon starts to ask him.

"Yeah you and I are both Riolu's. So it make sense we help each other out and call you a brother. Besides our aura's are the same as well. I could sense it"

Damon remembers that a Riolu and a Lucario can sense aura around them. He wonders if he could do the same as well in his new form.

"Anyway I'm Ramon. What's your name?" he ask. "Damon. Funny both of our names rhyme" said Damon. "I agree. Hey Damon could I ask you something?" Ramon ask.

"Sure Ramon what is it?" Damon ask. "Well what I want to ask is?"
1433.title: Another Riolu tries to intervene

choices: Damon and Ramon's quest for answers
Both of their Auras burn bright and merge
14331.content:
"Well, what I want to as is... Are we related?" Ramon said to Damon with absolute seriousness.

"Huh?" Damon was very confused. Had he heard the other riolu right?

"What I mean is..." Ramon looked away for a moment, and then back at Damon. "The memory is foggy, but... I used to be human. That's why my name sounds human, like I know you used to be."

"Wait as sec. You used to be human too? When did you change? Who changed you? Why did they do that to me too?" Damon started rattling off questions.

"Hold on Damon, hold on." Ramon put his paw up. "I don't know any of that. All I know is that I used to be human, and I woke up a month ago as a Riolu. Most of everything before that was blank except for my name. But when I sensed your presence, I felt a connection. Our auras are exactly the same. Some of my memories came back. Bits and pieces, but they are there."

"Wow..." Damon didn't know what to say. "You were alone as a Riolu for a month!? You saw; I could barely survive 5 minutes before, my human friend, Jodi, almost caught me."

"Wait, you knew her?"

"Yeah, we grew up together."

"This is getting even weirder. I somehow recognized her, but I couldn't put a name to her face."

"Hmmm. So you knew her, when you were human. And you think that we're related, but I don't have any other siblings, only..."

"Zach."

"Yeah, how did you..."

"I-I don't know. The name just popped into my head. I think he is my brother too."

"But, how. I don't even know you. I don't have any other brothers..." Damon thought for a moment; a memory was coming back to him. "Last week, I did find a weird headshot of me when I was younger. My parents said that it was just an edited picture for fun, but... there were two of me in it...."

"Are we twins?" Ramon asked the question hanging in the air.
14331.title: Are we related?

choices: Damon begins to have a weird dream
143311.content:
"Well there's only one thing we need to do now" said Damon. "What's that?" Ramon ask. "We need to go on a quest and find some answers" Damon replied.

"Answers?" said Ramon. "If you and I are related and why we both change into Riolu's and who change us into a pokemon in the first place. We'll need to work together" said Damon.

Ramon agrees. "Alright then Damon. I'm with you all the way" The two of them then shake each other's paws. Damon realize it was getting late.

"It's almost getting dark now. We should find a place to rest" said Damon. "We can go to my place. I made a home. for myself, after becoming a Riolu for a month"

Ramon then takes Damon to his place. It took them a few minuets to get there. It was a cave. "You live in a cave?" Damon ask.

"It's not much. But it's better then nothing" They then both enter. "We'll be sleeping here tonight. I know your use to sleeping in a nice comfy bed back home. But this is a little better then sleeping in a pokeball"

Ramon then takes Damon to a small pile of leaves. Damon lays on it. "What do you think?" Ramon ask. "Well I guess it's better then sleeping on the cold hard cave floor" said Damon.

Ramon then place a large leaf on Damon as he did the same. "Tomorrow we'll go on our quest and find the answer's we need" said Ramon.

"I hope we find them" said Damon. Ramon had fallen asleep just a few minuets ago. Damon could barely sleep. He started to miss his family and friends and wonder if there looking for him now.

He eventually goes to sleep and tries to get a goodnight's rest
143311.title: Damon and Ramon's quest for answers

choices: They lost and get capture by Jodi
A Lucario attacks and saves the two Riolus.
143312.content:
Suddenly both Damon and Ramon's aura's start to burn. The two of them starts to glow bright blue as their aura surrounds them.

"I'm starting to feel weird" said Damon. "I'm starting to feel the same" Suddenly Damon and Ramon could feel their body's starting to move and getting close to each other.

They both try to stop. But their body's refuse their command. "I can't control my body" said Damon. "I can't either" said Ramon.

Both of their body's then touch each other and a huge blue glow comes from both of them. This caught Jodi and her Piplup's attention.

"What's that? We should check it out Quinn" Jodi and her Piplup then checks it out. When the bright glow was gone. A two headed Riolu stood where Damon and Ramon use to be.

They rub their head and realize they had fuse together. Damon and Ramon were both surprise. "Ramon what are you doing in my body?" Damon ask.

"I could ask you the same thing" Jodi then appears before them. "Oh wow a two headed Riolu. I never seen one before. It must be a rare pokemon. Quick Piplup let's try to catch it"

Piplup was getting ready to battle. Damon and Ramon weren't use to their merge form. "This could be bad. What should we do?" Damon ask.

"I guess we'll have to fight. We got no other choice" said Ramon. "Easy for you to say" Damon and Ramon were getting ready to fight. Even thought it would be more harder for them now.
143312.title: Both of their Auras burn bright and merge

choices: Jodi takes her Pokemon to the nearest Pokemon Center
1433122.content:
Enough time had passed so Quinn was fully recovered and ready to take on the strange Riolus. Following a command from Jodi, Quinn used Bubble, firing a barrage of orbs straight at the joined Riolus.

"Quick dodge!" Ramon called out. Each tried jumping in the opposite direction and fell forward onto their chest. "Oof!" A grunt escaped Ramon's mouth. Thankfully, falling forward helped them dodge the bubble attack from Quinn. The bubbles flew over head, missing them by inches. "Well, that's not what I meant, but it worked."

"No, this is not going to work!" Damon yelled to his joined friend. "How are we going to fight! We can barely move like this!" It became obvious to both Riolus that each only controlled half of their new body. Every move they made would have to be a joint, coordinated effort.

"Huh, I wonder if these were the two Riolus I saw earlier? What happened to them?" Jodi picked up on the two-headed Riolus weakness. "Quinn, you can take them!" Jodi yelled to her Pokemon, refocusing on the battle. "Use Bubble again!"

"Alright!" Quinn said to himself. "Bubble!" He yelled, unleashing more blue orbs towards the fallen Riolus.

Damon and Ramon had worked their body back to a standing position, barely. Their individual legs were wobbling, having a hard time balancing their shared frame. "Should we dodge?" Damon asked quickly.

"No, you're right; we can hardly move. Just follow my lead. Focusing your aura and think of water. We're going to mimic the Piplup's move." Ramon replied. A light blue aura covered their body. "COPYCAT!" both of them yelled. Many more blue orbs were fired from the joined pair. These orbs collided with Quinn's and overtook them; blasting Quinn backwards.

"WHAT!" Jodi exclaimed. "We shouldn't have underestimated them! Come on Quinn! This isn't over yet." Quinn slowly rose to his feet.

"Wow!" Both Damon and Ramon exclaimed. They looked at each other, astonished by the power they demonstrated. "I guess there is at least one benefit to this strange fusion."

"Yeah! I can't believe how strong we are together." Ramon smiled brightly. In his excitement, he tried jumping into the air. This only resulted in their body loosing balance. Their arms swung widely trying to keep themselves righted.

"Quinn, now's your chance! Use Peck!" Jodi exclaimed. Quinn made a quick nod to his trainer before dashing forward. His beak glowed white. He used all his force to topple the Riolu pair over. "Now, use Brine!" Quinn took a deep breathe, expanding his body slightly. He then fired a powerful stream of water and the knocked over pair. The blast of water knocked the Riolus into a tree.

"Go pokeball!" With perfect aim, Jodi threw a pokeball at the Damon and Ramon. It hit them on their shared belly and swallowed them in a dazzling light. Three shakes later, Damon and Ramon were captured.
1433122.title: Capturing the Merged Riolus

choices: Damon helps Jodi with their nicnames.
14331221.content:
After getting capture by Jodi. Damon and Ramon starts to argue inside. "This is your fault!" Ramon yelled. "My fault? How is it my fault?" said Damon.

"Your the one who got us in this mess. If I didn't meet you. Then we wouldn't have merge together into a two headed Riolu" said Ramon.

"I didn't ask to be merge with you or be turn into a Riolu. Besides your the one who came to me after finding out we had the same Aura" said Damon.

"Then maybe I shouldn't have found you then" said Ramon. As the two Riolu's continue to argue. Damon and Ramon were suddenly call out of their pokeball.

Jodi goes up to the two of them. She pet's both of their heads. "It's nice to meet you. I am Jodi and this is my pokemon partner Piplup Quinn"

Piplup goes up to them. "Hello there. It's nice to meet you two. I hope we can be good friends" Piplup said to the both of them.

Jodi then place some pokefood for them. "I hope your hungry. I made them myself" Damon and Ramon then begins to look at their food.

They then felt their share stomach grumble. "I guess we should eat" said Damon. The two then begins to eat the food Jodi made. It was delicious.

"Look Ramon if were going to figure why were Riolu's and why we merge together. We'll have to work together as a team" said Damon.

"That is something we can both agree on" said Ramon. The two of them then shake paws. "Well I'm glad you two get along. I never seen a two headed Riolu before. You must be a rare pokemon. But what should I call you both?"

Jodi wonders what she should call them. "Should I give you separate nicknames or should I give you the same nickname" said Jodi.

"We should help my friend out and have her call us Damon and Ramon" said Damon. "How are we going to do that?" Ramon ask. "Leave it to me" said Damon
14331221.title: Damon and Ramon argue inside

choices: Several months passed on Jodi's Pokemon Journey
While in the pokeball, Damon and Ramon practice working together
143312211.content:
"Leave it to me." Damon said confidently. "Though," Damon looked at the body he shared with Ramon. "I'm going to need your help on this." He whispered his plan to Ramon.

Ramon nodded in agreement, liking Damon's idea. "That should work. Let's get started." Damon and Ramon each waved their hands to get Jodi's attention; she was lost in her own thoughts thinking about names for them.

"Oh? Did you guys want something? More food?" Jodi asked her newest Pokemon.

Ramon and Damon both shook their heads to say no, and inadvertently bumped skulls. Ramon rubbed the sore part, where his head hit Damon's, while Damon, ignoring the bump, pointed towards the ground. He and Ramon jointly bent down and started writing in the dirt.

Jodi was amazed that her Riolus knew how spell using human words. "Wow, you guys can write? Wait... those are names you are spelling. R-a-m-o-n and D-a-m-o-n. Ramon and Damon?"

Both of the Riolus nodded. Damon pointed to the name he drew in the sand, and then pointed to himself. He then pointed to the other name, and then pointed to Ramon.

"So those are the names you want?" Jodi asked. Ramon and Damon nodded again. "Alrighty then, I will call you guys Ramon and Damon."

Both of the Riolus smiled and high-fived. "I told you my plan would work!" Damon cheered.

"Hey, since she could read the names we spelled out; maybe we can tell her who we are? She might be able to help us find answers!" Ramon's excitement grew as he laid out his idea.

"Why did't I think of that!" Damon exclaimed as he and Ramon eagerly bent down and began writing out their story as briefly as possible. They focused on being humans turned Riolus, their unexpected fusion, and possibly being twins with messed memories.

"Sorry guys. I can't read what your trying to say." Jodi said apologetically. She could hardly say that they were words; it looked like random lines and curves. "Anyways, we'll be heading out soon. I will leave you guys out for a little bit longer." With that, Jodi turned and started rummaging through her bag.

"How come she couldn't read what we wrote?" Ramon asked, disappointed. "She could read our names."

"I don't know it does't make..." Damon looked down at what they had written. "...sense." He could not even read what they had written. "What happened? I know we wrote everything out, but... I can't even understand this now. It looks like... not a language."

"Maybe whoever turned us into Riolus also made it so we could not write anything, except for maybe our names." Ramon offered.

"Maybe... I guess all we can do now is travel with Jodi. We might find out more about who you are, and what happened to us along the way."

1433122111.title: Several months passed on Jodi's Pokemon Jou...

14331221111.content:
"Hmm... Quite an interesting pair of Lucarios you have hear." Professor Rowan commented upon first seeing Jodi's Pokemon. It had only taken a brief amount of time for the pair of trainers to travel to the good Professor's lab. "Can you tell me more about that day? You say that you found them as Riolus?"

"Yeah, they were young Riolus. Before I caught them, I had almost caught a 'normal' riolu, but it got away. Another one rescued it." Jodi said, looking upwards as she tried to remember back to that day. "Um, then I began searching for what seemed like hours. I could not find them. But as look would have it, there was this weird and bright blue energy that caught my attention. It lead me right to these guys."

Professor Rowan looked deep in thought as he looked at the two-headed Lucario in front of her. Damon and Ramon remained silent, hoping for some answers from the professor. "Anything else?"

"Um, these guys didn't battle very well together; they were uncoordinated like they had never been born that way. But's that's silly right." Jodi said with a smile, brushing off what she had just said. "They were probably just young and inexperienced."

"Perhaps..." The professor looked at Jodi with analyzing eyes. "But did you think that at first?"

"Um... no, I guess not. At first I thought they looked similar to the first two Riolus I saw. But that couldn't be possible." Jodi replied.

"I have seen a lot of miraculous things in my time, Jodi. I would not like to rule out anything just yet." The professor knelt down to look at the two Lucarios. "You see, these two look strikingly similar, but not as identical as I would have thought a naturally born pair of conjoined Lucarios would be. There are significant differences in their fur texture and patterns." He turned and walked to one of his computers. "Could you two step onto this platform. This is going to give us an x-ray of your body." The professor spoke towards the joined Lucarios.

Damon and Ramon looked at each other for a moment, both shared a deep excitement at the prospect of finally learning how they fused. "We defiantly should have gone to see him first. We could have had known a long time ago." Damon commented to Ramon as they walked onto the platform.

Ramon nodded, thinking back on their time joined together. "Yeah, it might of saved us from having those arguments and tussles over the last months." While they did not fight often, fights did occur. On a couple occasions, those fights made them loose battles. One of those occurred during the Vielstone city gym battle, and they lost to the gym leader's own Lucario.

After a few moments, the professor asked them to step off the platform for a light blue virtual image of their body to appear in their place. "Now, my expertise is in Pokemon evolution, but I can give you some helpful insights into Damon and Ramon's form. They were not born that way." There was a gasp from both Cynthia and Jodi.

"Are you sure?" Jodi asked.

"As sure as I can be. Here, let me show you this as a reference." The professor made a brown image of another pokemon appear beside the virtual copy of Damon and Ramon. "This is a Kanto region Pokemon called Doduo. This species naturally is born as conjoined twins." Another image of a yellow Pokemon appeared. "And this is a Jolteon."

Cynthia, who had been quite for this whole exchange, finally spoke, "Wait a moment professor. Jolteons are a single headed species of Pokemon; why does this image have two heads?"

Professor Rowan nodded, "Yes, that is true. However, this Pokemon was born as conjoined twin Eevees before it evolved. But, the reason I am showing you these images is to point out what I saw from the x-ray of Damon and Ramon. Look closely at the three images."

Everyone did, but Cynthia was the one who noticed the differences. "I see professor. Damon and Ramon have slightly different hues of blue, while the other Pokemon are all the same color as their twin."

"Exactly! This leads me to believe that Damon and Ramon were merged somehow, though I cannot say what caused this fusion." The professor then turn to look at Jodi and her Lucarios, who were now standing by her. "Jodi, I would suggest that you take Damon and Ramon to see Professor Sycamore from the Kalos region. He and I collaborate on evolution studies, but his main focus is the temporary mega evolution of Pokemon and unexplained changes in Pokemon. I also directed the trainer of the conjoined twin Jolteons, Chase, towards Professor Sycamore. He should be able to help you more than I can."

14332.title: Want to merge our aura's together?

choices: Damon fights off the Piplup and flees
Ramon jumps into control to keep them from getting caught
143321.content:
Damon sprinted off into the brush, moving fast. He instantly saw the effects of his and Ramon's joined bodies. His muscles were more powerful, his feet moved more quickly, and he felt that he stood a bit taller than before. He smiled from the thrill, and he could feel Ramon smile from within their linked minds. "This is amazing." He jumped high in the air, rotated through a backflip, and landed gracefully on his feet.

"Yeah, this is incredible. More amazing than I imagined." Ramon exclaimed within their linked minds.

Damon paused, "Wait, you have never done this before?"

Damon felt, Ramon smile as if embarrassed. "Truthfully, no I have not done this before. I have seen it done once, and I was eager to experience it."

Stopped near a tree, Damon lifted his paws and stared at them. "I know you said that you would let me control our body, but why don't you take over, so you have a chance at controlling it."

"Are you sure?" Ramon questioned.

"Yeah, go ahead." Damon said, and he forced his muscles to relax, and then his paws began to move on their own. He was not sure how to explain the sensation. Initially, it was like he was in the 'driver's seat' in a way. He had complete control. But now, it was like he was the passenger. Damon could feel his body, as if it was his own, but Ramon was the one maneuvering it.

He watched and smiled as Ramon climbed up a tree. Just before reaching the first branch, he kicked off, seemingly entering a swan dive. He corrected the rotation and landed on his feet and one hand in the dirt. Damon had to admit that feeling his body move on its own was unusual, but he sensed that he could attempt to take back control at any time. "Ramon, what happens if we both try and control our body at the same time?"

"I'm not sure." Ramon responded out loud, like Damon had done when he was in control. Ramon clenched their right paw into a fist. "Let find out. Try to unclench our right hand."

Damon attempted to push Ramon out of the 'driver seat' of their lined minds, but Ramon did not relinquish control. It felt more like they each were holding onto the wheel. The muscles in their right arm began to quiver, and then it began to seize. Shocked, Damon let go of the wheel in their mind, just as Ramon must have. Their body collapsed onto the ground as neither had taken control.

It was odd. He felt their body lying on the moss covered dirt, but he also saw himself and Ramon in his mind's eye, facing each other. He spoke to the other Riolu within their linked brains, "Okay, so if we both try to control our body, it seemed to get confused and shake uncontrollably."

"And if we both let go of control, our body collapses." Ramon commented. "One of us need to be in the driver's seat."

Damon paused, curious that Ramon used the words driver's seat, to describe how he also felt about it. He wondered how this Riolu would know about the driver's seat of a car. Before he could ask, Damon heard a noise in the brush to their left. He jumped into control to rotate their head. A flash of red and white was suddenly flying towards them, and he narrowly managed to roll out of the way. A pokeball hit the space where his body had been laying a moment before.

"I missed!" A familiar girl's voice exclaimed from the other side of the bush. When she stood up, Damon was surprised to see his friend, Jodi. "Alright Piplup, guess we have to do this the hard way. GO!" A moment later, a penguin-like Pokemon jumped through the brush.

Damon was shocked that Jodi had found him again. He had to give his friend credit, she was persistent. He spoke to the other Riolu through their linked minds, "Ramon, let me try and battle her, I need the practice. If we get into trouble, then I will let you take over, no questions asked."

"Deal." Ramon agreed.

choices: Damon and Ramon attempt to separate
Damon and Ramon explore their new partially fused body
1433212.content:
Damon hastily stood up, and jumped to the left to avoid a short stream of bubbles. As the attack flew past, he felt his aura, his and Ramon's shared aura tingle in response to the attack. Following instinct, Damon pulled his elbows back as he took in a deep breathe of air, he then released his own stream of bubbles at the opposing Piplup. His aim was true. He hit his opponent, but it seemed to recover quickly from the attack.

"Copycatting a water attack is not going to be very effective against a Piplup, even with our powers combined." Ramon commented in his mind.

"Don't you think I know that!" Damon yelled back through their linked minds. He was distracted for a moment, but that was all Jodi's Piplup needed.

His opponent charged forward with its beak glowing white, and stuck Damon in his chest. He heard Ramon cry out in pain from within him, having felt the same hit. "Let me take over." He growled.

"No, I got this. Stop distracting me." Damon yelled at his friend. He curled his fist, and felt energy flow around it. A green sphere surrounded his paw, and he thrust it at Piplup who nimbly jumped back.

"You missed..." Ramon complained.

Damon tried to ignore his backseat driver as Piplup came at him again with its glowing beak. Damon was about to jump, when he suddenly felt himself be pushed aside. His body had not been moved, only the other Riolu must have taken control of their body back. Damon watched and felt as an orange glow surrounded them. Ramon let their opponent hit their crossed arms. The impact of the Peak attack hurt, but Damon felt Ramon channel the hit into his own attack. A moment later, Ramon swept his arms in a long arc, releasing the energy into Piplup.

The penguin Pokemon was blasted backwards, landing roughly onto the mossy ground. "That is how you battle." Ramon smirked inwardly.

"You weren't giving me a chance!" Damon yelled. He launched himself at their inner stirring wheel, trying to seize back control. Their body began to seize, unable to listen to either himself or Ramon. His body, their body then flew backward as a white, large beak struck at their chest. Damon and Ramon both cried out in pain.

Damon, seemingly having greater wherewithal at the moment, stole back control of their body. He rushed forward and landed his arm's glowing, green fist into Piplup's stomach. Immediately, he felt a rush of energy flow into him, rapidly sealing a few of his wounds. Damon then turned and ran, only daring to look behind for a moment to make sure his opponent was not following him.

Damon ran for several minutes before finally pausing to rest his tired muscles. "You almost got us caught!" Ramon yelled within their linked minds.

"You are half to blame. You kept distracting me from the fight, and forcing me to fight with you too." Damon yelled back.

"You were going to make us lose; I had no choice but to wrestle control from you!" Ramon exclaimed as he tried to seize control again.

Damon felt his body collapse on the ground, seizing, as he fought with Ramon. "You can do your own fighting from now on! I splitting off from you." Damon tried concentrating, and their interlinked auras began to flare around them. When they had joined into one body, their auras did not merge, so much as interweave like their bodies had. They were still separate, in a sense, just woven together. Damon focused his aura into unlocking from Ramon's, like pulling stitches. To his relief, the process had begun to separate their bodies. He no longer felt Ramon's presence in their liked brains.

"No! I haven't had a chance to test out this new body!" Ramon yelled. He had actually yelled, from beside Damon.

Instantly, Damon felt resistance. His aura had slowed to a stop, held in a choke-hold of sorts, unable to unweave any further. Damon peeked to his eyes open and was surprised to see the other Riolu starting at him. Though, Ramon seemed too close, only inches from his own face. He knew that they had only partially separated before Ramon started to fight back. "Stop it Ramon! Find someone else to merge with." Damon yelled out loud. Try as he might, Damon could not finish unweaving his aura. They were locked in a battle of wills unable to separate or join any further.

Damon figured that he would have to knock the other Riolu out, force him unconscious. If he did so, he would be able to finish the process he started. "Might as well hit him with his own power..." Damon whispered aloud. In the palm of his right hand he channeled his aura, the part that was still interlocked with Ramon's. The part that was keeping him trapped in a half-merged body. He formed their linked auras into a sphere.

Seemingly caching on, Ramon yelled, "Oh no you don't!"

Damon watched as Ramon's left hand plunged into the sphere he had created. The sphere grew and grew, as their interlinked auras mixed and blended. Unable to manage the power, Damon forced the energy to be released as a blinding light rather than it discharging into them. And all at ounce, both of them stopped fighting for control, too exhausted to keep it going. Damon breathed in hard, letting his right hand rest beside him. "I can't believe you tried to stop me from separating us." Damon said weakly.

"I can't believe you were forcing me to separate... I still deserve a turn!" Ramon said back, equally tired.

"We're not arguing about this. I want to go my own way." Damon turned to glare at the other Riolu, who face was still too close.

"Fine. Its not worth the trouble fighting you anyways." He smirked. "In fact, I'll gladly help split away from you. You're more trouble than your worth."

Damon growled but chose not to retort. With his breathing managed, he closed his eyes again to focus his aura, only something felt different now. Damon could no longer distinguish between his aura and Ramon's. "What happened?"

"Oh no..." Ramon gasped from beside him. "Oh no, oh no, oh no..."

"What?" Damon glared at him annoyed.

"Your aura, my aura... Its like there is no difference now. Its like they have..." Ramon did not seem to know how to finish his statement.

"Merged..." Damon spoke up.

Ramon slowly turned his head to face Damon. He nodded. "We didn't just weave them together like we did in the beginning. Our auras' have... blended together. I don't think we can fuse or separate any more than we are now. We're stuck half-way!"
